Three Thousand Roubles

A dimly lit room, tension thickens.  
Svidrigaïlov smirks, a hint of mischief.  
Svidrigaïlov: “Marfa left Dounia three thousand roubles.”  

Razumihin gasps, disbelief etched on his face.  
Razumihin: “Are you telling the truth?”  
Svidrigaïlov: “Yes, tell her. I’m nearby.”  

---  

A doorway, two figures collide.  
Svidrigaïlov grins, Razumihin frowns.  
Razumihin: “What do you want?”  
Svidrigaïlov: “Just a chat, my friend.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov reveals that Marfa Petrovna left three thousand roubles to Dounia before her death.
